The Last Day of Pompeii is a large canvas painting by Russian artist Karl Bryullov 
in 1830-33. Painting[edit]. Detail of a woman (Yuliya Samoylova). Briullov visited 
the site of Pompeii in 1828, making numerous sketches depicting the 79 CE 
Vesuvius eruption.
